llmgt.data.games.sample_games(config_block: dict, n_batches: int = 1) → list[dict][source]¶

Samples a list of 2x2 games according to the provided configuration.

Parameters:

  • config_block (dict) – A configuration block defining payoff structure, Nash location, and symbolic labeling.

  • n_batches (int, optional) – Number of batches to sample. Defaults to 1.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries, each representing a sampled game.

Includes matrix data, action labels, and NE labels.

Return type:

list[dict]
